function Rating(props){ const {rating, numReviews}= props; return(
=1 ? 'fas fa-star' :rating>=0.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'} /> =2 ? 'fas fa-star' :rating>=1.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'} /> =3 ? 'fas fa-star' :rating>=2.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'} /> =4 ? 'fas fa-star' :rating>=3.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'} /> =5 ? 'fas fa-star' :rating>=4.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'} /> {nu}
) } export default Rating;
